quote-source: Luke McKinney, 6 Realistic Changes That Would Improve Superhero Movies, Cracked, February 25, 2014.
quote-text: Just once, I want to see this immensity of ass-kickers actually kick ass. And not as a quick joke: I want the heroes to spend the whole movie finding big, bad villains, then blot out their sun and just win. Because the villain isn’t an entire superpower with an insane military budget and a hardware fetish, and simply can’t have anything on the scale of the helicarrier. That is the whole point of a helicarrier.
